mapper.insert: insert into myPlace(mno, userid, mcategory, title, content) values (myPlace_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{mcategory}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select mno,myPlace.userid,title,content,regdate,mcount,mcategory,nickname, mytown from myPlace right outer join member on member.userid = myPlace.userid where mno>0 order by mno desc, regdate desc
